title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 152.17 - Short-period New York State income tax returns
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 152.17 - Short-period New York State income tax returns

State Regulations

In the case of a New York State income tax return for a
period of less than 12 months, including a short-period income tax return due
to a change of accounting period, the income tax due thereon must, without
assessment, notice or demand, be paid on or before the due date prescribed for
filing such return. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
152.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
